text:
e="preserve">Robert Lee Atkins, Jr. (April 2, 1946 – September 22, 2020) was an American professional football player. He was a defensive back in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the St. Louis Cardinals from 1968 to 1969 and for the Houston Oilers from 1970 to 1976. Atkins was born in Modesto, California.
Atkins died on September 22, 2020 at the age of 74.
